casebody.data:
Salvatore MARSICO and David Hand
v.
NEW HANOVER COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 304P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Kathleen G. Sumner, Greensboro, for Marsico, Salvatore, et al. Deborah R. Stagner, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for New Hanover County Board of Education. Neal A. Ramee, Raleigh, for New Hanover County Board of Education.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th of August 2015 by Petitioners in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
